DOC.brief_summary: Hyperglycemia is an independent risk factor for the development of diabetic complications in type 2 diabetes. Exercise improves glycemic control, however, the role of exercise characteristics (e.g. intensity, type of exercise, timing, frequency) remains to be elucidated.
